title: What are some good mobile apps for emergency response? - Quora

response.answer_text: RAKSHA is a great tool to respond to any emergencies for the citizens of the world. It will assist in posting your emergency information when in need with a single click. Key Features: Click of a button, captures a photo of the incident location and send an SMS image to your loved ones and simultaneously posts in Facebook and TwitterJust shake your phone, sends an SMS message to your loved ones and posts to your Facebook and Twitter.Click of a button, will initiate a Call to police with an alert messageYou can locate your location just click of a button, quite often we don't know exact location, but app will display an address along with a mapFlash Light, Emergency Alarm, and other useful safety features are handy for all the users.Avani created this App to all the citizens of the world, to make a safe and better place for living and available for Free.

There are many emergency response apps. But, out of all these, I like this SOS app. This app helped me a lot in most of the emergency situations like during my night shifts, the “Watch Over Me” feature of this app makes me feel safe and secure throughout the journey. This is an amazing emergency response button for those who are in an unsafe situation or feels that they are not safe. As soon as you tap Watch Over Me button, the emergency response team will call you and take all the details and will continue to track you. They keep an eye on you and in case of any mishappening, we will take certain actions accordingly. Another amazing feature of this app is the SOS button. By taping the SOS button, Their team will send an alert message to your emergency contacts that “you are unsafe and need help”. Moreover, this app also provides an emergency medical response to elderly people. Now the solution to your safety problem is just a tap away. Be Safe and Secure by just downloading this emergency response app from Rakkshak.in
